quest.name: You Have the Rite
journal:
Zukin would have you undertake an important rite.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Obtain Sui–no–Mamizu from the placid priestess in Sui–no–Sato.
Sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu near the consecrated shell.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: It is time, Forename. As one of the Divine Circle, you must undertake the rite of purification, that you might deepen your bond with the kami of the hunt.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: To this end, you will require a special kind of holy water called Sui–no–Mamizu. This can be had from a priestess of Sui–no–Sato.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Once you have the water, return hither to Tamamizu and present yourself before the consecrated shell yonder. There you must sprinkle the water and offer a prayer to the kami.

dialogue.name: SUIWOMAN02981
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be the womanman of whom the Kojin spoke. I have your water. Take it, and may you find favor with the kami.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Come to undertake the rite, have you? Go ahead and sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu, then say a prayer to the kami.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are purified from head to toe. Now you may pray to the consecrated shell.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This does not appear to be the right spot. Try sprinkling the water again near the consecrated shell.

dialogue.name: SUIWOMAN02981
dialogue.text: You have the water. Shouldn't you be heading back to Tamamizu?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This appears to be the right spot to sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Good, good. 'Tis important to give thanks. The kami will surely smile upon your treasure-hunting endeavors.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Though you are not Kojin, you respect our ways as your own. Full glad am I to know a shell-less one such as you.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Purifying yourself is but half of the rite. Now you must pray to the kami.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: The rite is complete? That is well. As you know, we Kojin seek out treasure that we might strengthen our bond with the kami.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: And by the rite, we entreat he who abides in the shell to facilitate this bond. By honoring him, we may seek with greater success, thereby honoring all.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Though you are not Kojin, you respect our ways as your own. Full glad am I to know a shell-less one such as you.
